tokens.text: validates that JSON files do not contain byte order marks

title: BOM Validation
description: Validates that JSON files do not contain byte order marks (BOM). BOMs can cause parsing failures in Minecraft.

fields.title: BOM Detected
fields.description: Error when a JSON file begins with a UTF-8 BOM (byte order mark). Minecraft cannot parse JSON files with BOMs. Re-save the file as UTF-8 without BOM using a text editor.
fields.howToUse: Open the file in VS Code or Notepad++ and save it as 'UTF-8' (not 'UTF-8 with BOM'). In VS Code, click the encoding in the status bar and select 'Save with Encoding' â†’ 'UTF-8'.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the file with BOM
